channel.title: Trading help!

item.title: Trading help!
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

im confused…

Villu-Reborn has a lot of stuff!
Can you give me directions of where to go please?
I cant find the misc! or trading thing!

[br][size=1]Posted at: November 24, 2006, 01:37:24 PM[/size][hr][quote=“junkj, post:1, topic:28097”]I was wandering around scar and thought about updating my autotalker script so it can trade.
Is there any procedure to trade people?
If there is can anyone post one or help me with one?

Thanks!

JunkJ

(my script!)

[scar]{_______________________________________________________________________________
______________________________******
______________________________________________________________________________
_______________***_____________________/___________________
_______________________________******_________/ *
_/________*_* _/_______
____________/__________*___ _/________
___***********_______*_

{ !=$JUNKY PRODUCTIONS$=! }
{__________________________!READ AT OWN RISK!__________________________________}
{ !NOT! !responsible for any BANNED acount! }
{ FIRST SCRIPT EVER }
{ !REPORT ANY BUGS OR STUFF THAT DOESNT WORK! }
{ !make a extra line at the bottom and put the cursor there or it will mess up }
{!where ever it says “ONLY CHANGE THIS” read or change what its talking about! }
{ !!!IF COPIED,SOME OF THE CREDIT GOES TO ME, DO NOT SAY ALL TO YOU!GOSH!!! }
{ ±+SPECIAL THANKS TO…±+ }
{ BULLZEYE }
{ JUNIOR }
{ AND OTHERS THAT HELPED }
{ ENJOY THE JUNKY SCRIPT THAT IS NOT UPDATED YET,LOOK BELOW FOR THE UPDATES! }
//////////////////////////////////|||:|||\\\\\\\\\
{VERSION 1.0— THIS IS IT!}
{VERSION 1.1— COMING SOON!}
{VERSION 1.2— COMING SOON!(DUNNO WHEN!)}

         {PLEASE REMEMBER BANNED ACOUNTS ARE NOT MY PROBLEM!}

{________________________________ENJOY!________________________________________}

program autotalker;

const
message1=(‘Hello!’); //type what you want him/her to say.ONLY CHANGE THIS!!

message2=(‘auto talking please wait till trade’); //DO NOT CHANGE THIS!
message3=(‘Thank you for using JunkJ"s auto talker!’); //OR THIS!
message4=(‘remember:Read the instructions-ECT. above!’); //OR THIS!
message5=(‘press ALT+CTRL+S tostop auto talking’); //OR THIS!!!

RandomTime=1000; //Change to set random time.EX=5000 (5 sec,1-999 MILL.SEC)

procedure autotalk;
begin
wait(1000+random(RandomTime))
SendKeys(message1 + Chr(13))
end;

begin
ActivateClient;
ClearDebug;
Writeln(message2)
Writeln(message3)
Writeln(message4)
Writeln(message5)
repeat
autotalk;
until(false)
end.

procedure trade; //CAN THERE BE A TRADE PROCEDURE?

begin;

end.
[/scar][/quote]

i also need help on this trading thing i found on villu reborn(thanks bullz eye!)
here it is!

[scar]Procedure trade;
var cx, cy : integer;
begin if (FindColor(cx,cy,8388736,20,355,425,430) = True) Then begin
Wait(500);
CMouse(cx+10,cy+3,0,0,True);
Wait(500);
end; end;
Function FindTheTrade : Boolean;

var xx, yy : integer;
begin if (FindColor(xx,yy,8388736,20,355,425,430) = True) Then
result := True
[/scar]

thanks if someone can help!

Read full topic

item.title: Trading help!
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

Yes, in SRL. <3 SRL

Yes, well, if you have SRL, then open up the manual. Go under misc -> Trade. There are some procedures. If you don’t have SRL, then get it at www.villu-reborn.com

Oh, and remember to include SRL/SRL.SCAR and SRL/SRL/Misc/Trade.SCAR

Read full topic

item.title: Trading help!
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

I was wandering around scar and thought about updating my autotalker script so it can trade.
Is there any procedure to trade people?
If there is can anyone post one or help me with one?

(Need some more help at the trading thing i found at the villu-reborn!,Please fix that if you can!)

Thanks!

JunkJ

(my script!)

[scar]{_______________________________________________________________________________
______________________________******
______________________________________________________________________________
_______________***_____________________/___________________
_______________________________******_________/ *
_/________*_*\ _/_______
____________/__________*___ _/________
___***********_______*_
